group_1.narration: A kind of mutual aid society that @has roots in the Minaminagi Ward.
It was started in the black@market by Chinese immigrants@after the Second World War.
Now it's made up of the original founders'@sons and daughters.
[textRed:Meiyui Chun] is a member of the @third generation of the Blue Seas.

group_1.textRight: Hmmm, well...@I know this is dangerous, but...
I trust my experience, Miss Blue Seas.

group_1.textLeft: You're aware how dangerous@a move that is, I see.

group_1.narration: The Blue Seas Family knew everything@that went on in Kamihama, light or dark.
They were everywhere in town, and @they gradually expanded their presence.

group_1.textLeft: Fine then, let me ask.@What if you're making the wrong choice?

group_1.narration: In truth, the Blue Seas Family used @fear as a weapon to keep people in line.
In a way, it was sort of...

group_1.textLeft: That was just what I needed! Mahjong!

group_1.textRight: Oh no!@I had a bad feeling about that move...
It's no good!@Meiyui is unstoppable today...
Don't you ever get tired of winning?@Blue Seas Family players are too good!

group_1.narration: The family has left its @days as a gang in the past.
And transformed completely, returning to its@original purpose as a mutual aid society.
It has gotten smaller and more local, @and whenever someone is in trouble @or need, they rush to their aid.
It plays a major role in cleaning up the@neighborhood, running festivals, and@promoting local development.
It is now more of an association of @traders and youngsters than gangsters.

group_1.textRight: Ok, call me anytime if you don't@have enough mahjong players.
Next time I won't lose! @You hear me, Meiyui?

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle* The Blue Seas Family is @always at your service!

group_1.narration: And so, the Blue Seas Family @and the locals live together in peace.
But a storm was coming that @would shatter that precious peace...
